Description_lang: The cooldowns of Repentance and Blinding Light are reduced by ${$s2/-1000} sec.

description_blz.en_US: The cooldowns of Repentance and Blinding Light are reduced by 15 sec.
description_blz.es_MX: El tiempo de reutilización de Arrepentimiento y Luz cegadora se reduce 15 s.
description_blz.pt_BR: Reduz em 15 s a recarga de Contrição e Luz Ofuscante.
description_blz.de_DE: Die Abklingzeiten von 'Buße' und 'Blendendes Licht' werden um 15 Sek. verringert.
description_blz.en_GB: The cooldowns of Repentance and Blinding Light are reduced by 15 sec.
description_blz.es_ES: Los tiempos de reutilización de Arrepentimiento y Luz cegadora se reducen 15 s.
description_blz.fr_FR: Les temps de recharge de Repentir et Lumière aveuglante sont réduits de 15 s.
description_blz.it_IT: Riduce i tempi di recupero di Penitenza e Luce Accecante di 15 s.
description_blz.ru_RU: Время восстановления "Покаяния" и "Слепящего света" сокращается на 15 сек.
description_blz.ko_KR: 참회 및 눈부신 빛의 재사용 대기시간이 15초만큼 감소합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 懺悔和盲目之光的冷卻時間縮短15秒。
description_blz.zh_CN: 忏悔和盲目之光的冷却时间减少15秒。
